PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_VoltageInstrumentTransformer
PropertySetDef.Definition: Instrument transformers are high accuracy class electrical devices used to isolate or transform voltage or current levels. The main function of instrument transformers is to operate instruments or metering from high voltage or high current circuits, safely isolating secondary control circuitry from the high voltages or currents. Combination instrument transformers are metering voltage.

PropertyDef.Name: AccuracyClass
PropertyDef.Definition: A designation assigned to an instrument transformer the current (or voltage) error and phase displacement of which remain within specified limits under prescribed conditions of use (IEC 321-01-24).

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage that a device is designed to handle.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal current that is designed to be measured.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalPower
PropertyDef.Definition: A conventional value of apparent power determining a value of the rated current that may be carried with rated voltage applied, under specified conditions. ( IEV ref 421-04-04)

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPhases
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of phases that the equipment operates on.

PropertyDef.Name: PrimaryFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: The frequency that is going to be transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 変圧器の1次側に伝送される周波数。

PropertyDef.Name: PrimaryVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage that is going to be transformed and that runs into the transformer on the primary side.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 変圧器の1次側に伝送される電圧。

PropertyDef.Name: SecondaryFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: The frequency that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 変圧器の2次側に出力される周波数。

PropertyDef.Name: SecondaryVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage that has been transformed and is running out of the transformer on the secondary side.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 変圧器の2次側へ出力される電圧。
